page.title: 16John Smith Celebrations
page.content: To mark the anniversary of the land- ing of the first settlers' ship,there are dual celebrations being held in the village and in America. On April 28th,the Governor of Virginia,and many Virginians,came to dedicate the{Virginia Panels}in the local church.These stained glass windows tell the story of the colony's founding and Smith's part in it.On the following day a replica of the ship, the{Godspeed,}sailed from London bound for Virginia.The villagers and their guests had a marvellous day and many plans for future visits were made. The one sad part was the lead up to the installation of the panels.The Diocesan Authority did not want them put in despite the fact that the villagers did.Finally,they were put in but in a chancel window instead of in each of the nave windows.
